question: Which ministry has appointed 4 institutes to interact with stakeholders and suggest measures to push India's ranking in ease of doing business index?
explanation: Commerce & industry ministry has appointed 4 institutes to interact with stakeholders and suggest measures to push India's ranking in ease of doing business index. NICMAR, IIFT, ICSI and ICAI are the four institutes that have been roped in for the exercise. As per the latest World bank's Ease of Doing Business ranking, India's position improved by 30 places to 100th.
